title: Ep 511 Another Incredible Democrat Scandal Being Swept Under the Rug
description:
In this episode I address the GOP's cowardice in addressing Obamacare's failures.  http://bit.ly/2uxeG0b   I also discuss the Trump announcement regarding transgender people in the military.  http://www.foxnews.com/politics/2017/07/26/trump-announces-ban-on-transgender-individuals-serving-in-military.html     I discuss the brewing Democrat scandal involving Pakistani IT professionals. http://www.theblaze.com/news/2017/07/25/breaking-democratic-it-aide-imran-awan-arrested-at-dulles-while-trying-to-flee-the-us/?utm_content=buffer0929c&utm_medium=social&utm_source=facebook.com&utm_campaign=buffer   I discuss the Obama era NSA spying scandal and some breaking revelations which should trouble all of us.  http://thehill.com/policy/national-security/343785-newly-declassified-memos-detail-extent-of-improper-obama-era-nsa?amp   Finally, I address a growing drone threat.  http://www.defenseone.com/threats/2017/07/trumps-special-ops-pick-says-terror-drones-might-soon-reach-us-africa-how-worried-should-we-be/139642/?oref=d-topstory  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
